name: Energy Wave
instant:
self.value = self.initiator.attack - self.bystander.defense
self.bystander.health -= self.value
print("A sudden force smites {}.\n".format(self.bystander.name))
print("{} takes {} damage from the impact.\n".format(self.bystander.name, self.value))
flavour_text: A shot of powerful pure mana energy.

name: Focus Barrier
instant:
self.value = self.initiator.defense * 1.5
self.initiator.defense += self.value
print("A protective barrier envelopes {}.\n".format(self.initiator.name))
print("{}'s shield will reduce damage taken.\n".format(self.initiator.name))
deactivation:
self.initiator.defense -= self.value
print("{}'s Focus Barrier has dissipated.\n".format(self.initiator.name))
flavour_text: A mana shield that protects the caster from harm. Useful during a snowball fight.
